metadata.title: CVE-2015-8537 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: app/views/journals/index.builder in Redmine before 2.6.9, 3.0.x before3.0.7, and 3.1.x before 3.1.3 allows remote attackers to obtain sensitiveinformation by viewing an Atom feed.

criterions.comment: redmine: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
